metadata.description: Personal Claude Code plugin collection with APOD downloader, custom statusline, skill generator, Chrome DevTools, and zensical development tools

plugins.name: apod
plugins.description: Download NASA's Astronomy Picture of the Day with metadata

plugins.name: custom-statusline
plugins.description: Comprehensive Claude Code status line with Nerd Font icons, git status, API usage tracking, and interactive configuration

plugins.name: generate-skill
plugins.description: Create new Claude Code skills with proper structure and best practices

plugins.name: chrome-devtools
plugins.description: Chrome DevTools MCP guide for browser automation with parallel agent support

plugins.name: zensical-debug
plugins.description: Debug and visually verify zensical sites with Chrome DevTools

plugins.name: zensical-development
plugins.description: Best practices for developing zensical/Material for MkDocs static sites
